summary.span: 表示一个代码组，该代码组的策略声明是当前代码组的策略声明和所有其匹配的子代码组策略声明的联合。

span.span: Represents a code group whose policy statement is the union of the current code group's policy statement and the policy statement of all its matching child code groups.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别都包含一个根代码组, 该代码组可以拥有子代码组, 从而形成一个树。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups (and so on), forming a tree. 每个代码组都有一个成员条件, 该条件根据程序集的证据确定给定程序集是否属于它。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it or not, based on the evidence for that assembly. 只有其成员条件与给定程序集匹配的代码组及其子代码组才会应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 是最常见的代码组类型;所有匹配的子代码组的策略声明 (以及通过扩展它们的子代码组) 与匹配的父代码组的权限集组合在一起。 is the most common type of code group; the policy statement of all matching child code groups (and by extension their child code groups) are combined with the permission set of the matching parent code group. 因此, 如果它的成员资格条件匹配, 则此代码组构成其策略语句的并集及其所有子代码组的联合。Thus, if its membership condition matches, this code group forms the union of its policy statement and those of all its child code groups that also match the evidence. 代码组是由 CASPOL.EXE 实用程序创建的代码组 (请参阅[caspol.exe (代码访问安全策略工具)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。 code groups are the code groups created by the CASPOL utility (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition membershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement policy) cil managed
Public Sub New (membershipCondition As IMembershipCondition, policy As PolicyStatement)

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成员条件，它测试证据以确定此代码组是否应用策略。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 形式为权限集和特性的代码组的策略声明，这些权限集和特性将被授予匹配成员条件的代码。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个基本代码组, 并应从自定义代码组的构造函数中调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 您可以通过使用方法添加子代码组。You can add child code groups by using the method.

span.span: The type of the parameter is not valid.
-or-
The type of the parameter is not valid.

Public Overrides Function Copy () As CodeGroup

summary.span: 生成当前代码组的深层副本。

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the current code group.

returns.span: 当前代码组（包括其成员条件和子代码组）的等效副本。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会创建代码组的深层副本, 因此还会生成代码组包含的所有对象的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

span.span: Gets the merge logic.
Always the string "Union".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 对一组证据解析代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集, 此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果存在匹配项, 则此方法返回代码组的策略声明, 包括子代码组的计算。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于联合代码组, 还会解析其成员条件与证据匹配的所有子代码组, 并且所有生成的策略语句与父联合代码组的策略声明构成一个联合。For union code groups, all child code groups whose membership condition match the evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements form a union with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每个子代码组类型确定如何应用其子组, 具体取决于其各自方法的工作方式。Each child code group type determines how its child groups are applied, depending on how their respective methods work. .NET Framework 安全系统将在策略级别上使用, 以确定要从生成的策略语句和程序集上的代码请求中授予加载的代码的权限。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 如果成员条件与指定的证据不匹配, 此方法将返回`null`; 否则, 它会将权限集设置为返回 (P) 等于代码组的策略语句, 然后继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, this method returns `null`; otherwise, it sets the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement, and then continues. 对于每个子代码组, 该方法解析具有相同证据的代码组;如果结果不`null`为, 则它将设置 p 等于 p 和子代码组的策略语句。For each child code group, the method resolves the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, it sets P equal to the union of P and the child code group's policy statement. 然后返回 P, 这现在是当前代码组的策略声明和所有子组策略语句的联合。It then returns P, which is now the union of the current code group's policy statement and all child group policy statements.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 将不止一个代码组（包括父代码组和任何子代码组）标记为 。

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 证据匹配的完整代码组集。

span.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要加载的程序集, 此方法通过首先检查针对指定证据的成员资格条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果有匹配项, 则此方法返回一个根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组可能包含子代码组, 这些子代码组也可能包含子代码组, 因此返回值反映了由提供的证据匹配的一组完整的代码组。The code group that is returned may contain child code groups, which, in turn, may also contain child code groups, so the return value reflects the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

span.span: The parameter is .
